register_agenda_desc: Are you sure you want to register this agenda?
create_qr_doc_desc: Are you sure you want to create a QR document for this agenda?
committee_desc: Press this button to view the list of committees
registered_desc: Press this button to view the list of participants who have registered
register_agenda_btn_desc: Press this button to register this agenda
gallery_desc: This section contains a photo gallery of this agenda
visited_desc: Press this button to view the list of participants who have visited
qr_code_desc: Press this button to view the QR Code of this agenda
qr_reader_desc: Press this button to open the QR code scanner
qr_code_presence_desc: Scan this QR code to confirm your attendance.
payment_method_desc: Select the payment method you want to use
payment_help: If you have any questions about payment, please contact us
if_guest: If you are a guest, please make payment as soon as possible so that we can process your registration
is_informatics_message: If you are an Informatics student, please log in to your account if you already have an account. If not, please register first.
registered_as_participant: Thank you, you have registered as a participant for this agenda.
registered_as_committee: Thank you, you have registered as a committee for this agenda.
cancel_registration_confirmation: Are you sure you want to cancel the registration of this agenda?
cancel_registration_success: The registration for this agenda has been canceled.
cancel_registration_error: Failed to cancel the registration for this agenda.
registration_information_desc: This section contains registration information for this agenda.
no_payment_required: No payment is required for this agenda.
no_participant_registered: No participants registered for this agenda.
no_participant_registered_description: No participants registered for this agenda. Press the button below to register.
